https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kXJHlw7iRzQP6fnZItHVPbHVxLW.jpg Crystal, the girlfriend of Roman, Jeremiah's American boss whom he kidnaps. As Jeremiah's plans fail, Roman sends Bill, a psychopathic hitman after them. Crystal and Jeremiah tread the dangerous path of a love on the run. But as they run farther and as they fall deeper, a dark secret burns even stronger. Blood Ransom
